name: Brave Jumpers
description:
"Help these little jumpers to find the farmer in this short memory-puzzle game."

These round creatures are a little oblivious though so they can only perceive one dangerous obstacle each. See if you or your friend can memorize the safe route. :)

Credits
Programming - Przemek Krowinski
3D art & animation - Sean Battle
2D art - Ira Battle
Sound & Music - Merlin Györy
